dmca.title: Illustrator complains of infringement in weblog
dmca.body:
14.DIC.2005 11:59 DRESSER Italia SPA
 
My name is [private] (owner of website: www.inkspinster.com). I am a professional illustrator and cartoonist. 

This Blogger user: http://mishalander.blogspot.com

has published on her blog (not in a specific post but on the left side of the main page) one of my illustrations that are copyrighted. She took it without my consent and refused to remove it even after I asked for it several times. She simply ignored my repeated requests. I need to have that image removed from her blog, because no one has the right to publish my works without my explicit consent, as clearly stated on my site. 

The illustration she took without permission represents a little girl dressed in black, reading a newspaper. It is on the left side of the page, right under the writing:
